name: Tales in Passing
description:
CW: Themes of death and grief
 Made for Newbies Game Jam #2 - Death = Progress.
 (And my first game ever!)

----------------------------

SUMMARY

You are an entity within the realm of the departed. Finding yourself with the souls of those who are about to pass on, you decide to shepherd them to the end and hear their tales.

Tales in Passing is a narrative game with platformer movement.

---------------------------

CURRENT STATE

One level completed in time for Newbies Game Jam #2, "Casey". Two other levels - "Jericho" and "Lei" - and more may be released at a later date.

SOFTWARE USED
  • GDevelop
  • FireAlpaca
  • LabChirp
CREDITS
  • Music by Kevin Macleod (Incompetech)
  • Control button display by Xelu, from the Free Prompts Pack
  • Red Lock and Close Button by Kenney
KNOWN ISSUES
  • Level building (Like. As a whole. Me trying to make maps was a mistake.)
  • Delays in audio loading
  • Walk animation not switching when in contact with black areas
  • Sprite not flipping when jumping mid-air
SPECIAL THANKS to...
  • The Kawaii Crew on Patreon that watched me log all my progress in making this game: Mary Magdal, Amelia Peterson, Songbirdo, La Belle Ramlie, LunaDunno, Mallow, Jade, Charlotte, Zahara Dansby, Logan James, and Literal cat Sylvi 'wingedcatgirl' is gay and doesn't go to bed on time. Reblog if you too are gay and or don't go to bed on time
  • Linkyu, my spouse who gave me many technical resources, play-tested and gave me ten times more emotional support
